name: softh__
description: * clone repo from github => git clone https://github.com/An31/softh__.git * create a package.json => npm init -y * install express => npm install --save express * create a /public folder, fill it with /public/index.html * create a /server.js, fill it with a code. * see commit trial 1,    *start it using #node server.js in cmd,   *start it on local machine: localhost:3000   *start using heroku   + Configure heroku.    - # set nodejs on heroku    - nodejs version : node -v  => v6.9.4    - npm version : npm -v  => v3.10.10    - git version : git --version  => v2.8.1    - Delete app if you have more than 5 (go to app and settings and delete an app).    - Go through the link bellow    - link: https://devcenter.heroku.com/articles/getting-started-with-nodejs#set-up
author: Anel Husakovic
